DOC.brief_summary: Reflexology treatment may influence severity chemotherapy-induced nausea vomit . This study aim investigate clinical effect reflexology chemotherapy-induced nausea vomiting .
DOC.brief_title: Complementary Effect Reflexology Chemotherapy-Induced Nausea Vomiting
DOC.criteria: Chemotherapy patient Myocardial Infarction previous 6 month Mechanical colonic obstruction
